meta.title: Privacy Policy - Automatron.ai
meta.description: Learn how Automatron.ai protects your privacy and handles your personal information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content1: At Automatron.ai, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our automation services.
overview.content2: We believe in transparency and will only collect information necessary to provide you with excellent automation solutions and support.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us and some information automatically when you use our services:

items.files: Sample files or documents you share with us

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

purposes.service: Providing automation services and project delivery
purposes.communication: Communicating about your projects and support
purposes.improvement: Improving our services and developing new solutions
purposes.legal: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share information only in these limited circumstances:

items.hosting: Cloud hosting providers for data storage
items.monitoring: Error monitoring services for system reliability

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose information when required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and safety.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your information:

measures.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
measures.monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection
measures.retention: Data retention policies and secure deletion

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use minimal tracking technologies to improve your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for website functionality, language preferences, and security.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We use privacy-friendly analytics (Plausible) that doesn't require cookie consent and respects your privacy.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

list.access: Access to your personal information we hold
list.correction: Correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
list.deletion: Deletion of your personal information (subject to legal requirements)
list.portability: Data portability in a machine-readable format
list.objection: Objection to processing for legitimate interests

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content1: We retain your information only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy:

periods.inquiries: Contact inquiries: 2 years from last contact
periods.projects: Project data: 3 years after project completion

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information during international transfers.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through our website. Your continued use of our services after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

meta.description: Terms and conditions for using Automatron.ai automation services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing or using Automatron.ai services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: These terms apply to all users of our website and services, including clients, visitors, and anyone who accesses our content.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: Automatron.ai provides automation solutions for businesses and individuals, including:

deliverables.title: Deliverables
deliverables.content: Our services typically include scripts, documentation, configuration files, and support materials tailored to your specific needs.

steps.proposal: Detailed proposal with scope, timeline, and pricing
steps.delivery: Development, testing, and delivery of solutions

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.content: Project timelines vary based on complexity, typically ranging from 1-7 days for most services. Rush projects may incur additional fees.

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment
pricing.intro: Our pricing is project-based and depends on complexity and scope:

items.starter: Starter Package: $249-$499 for single automation tasks
items.bundle: Bundle Package: $699-$1,200 for multiple related automations
items.website: Website Basic: $699-$1,200 for complete website solutions
items.care: Care Plan: $149-$399/month for ongoing automation support

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment is typically required before project initiation. We accept various payment methods and can discuss payment plans for larger projects.

items.information: Provide accurate and complete project information
items.access: Grant necessary access to systems and data
items.testing: Test delivered solutions in your environment
items.backup: Maintain backups of important data before implementation

items.quality: Deliver quality solutions that meet agreed specifications
items.support: Offer reasonable support during and after delivery
items.confidentiality: Maintain confidentiality of your business information
items.safety: Follow safety-first practices to protect your data

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: Upon full payment, you own the custom automation solutions we create specifically for your use. This includes scripts, configurations, and documentation developed for your project.
intellectual.content2: We retain rights to our general methodologies, frameworks, and any pre-existing intellectual property used in delivering your solution.
intellectual.content3: You grant us permission to use anonymized examples of your project in our portfolio and marketing materials, unless otherwise agreed.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content1: We understand that your business processes and data are confidential. We commit to maintaining strict confidentiality of all information shared with us.
confidentiality.content2: We will not disclose, use, or share your confidential information except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.
confidentiality.content3: This confidentiality obligation continues indefinitely, even after project completion or termination of our relationship.

warranties.title: Warranties and Disclaimers
warranties.content1: We warrant that our services will be performed with professional skill and care. We will correct any defects in our work at no additional charge within 30 days of delivery.
warranties.content2: However, we cannot guarantee that our solutions will be error-free or will meet all your requirements. We recommend thorough testing before full implementation.
warranties.content3: Our services are provided 'as is' without other warranties, express or implied, including warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content1: Our liability for any claims related to our services is limited to the amount you paid for the specific service that gave rise to the claim.
limitation.content2: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including lost profits, data loss, or business interruption.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content1: Either party may terminate a project with written notice. You will pay for work completed up to the termination date.
termination.content2: We reserve the right to terminate services immediately if you breach these terms or engage in prohibited activities.
termination.content3: Upon termination, we will deliver any completed work and return or destroy your confidential information as requested.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where Automatron.ai operates. Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration or in the appropriate courts of that jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through our website. Continued use of our services after changes indicates acceptance of the updated terms.
